document.title: WordPress : mes extensions
document.author: Laurent
document.text:
Voici un petit billet pour decrire les extensions WordPress que jutilise. Edition
Save Editor Scroll Position HTML Editor Reloaded Administration Reglages HTML Editor Extensible HTML Editor Buttons HTML Special Characters Helper HTML Editor Syntax Highlighter HTML Editor Reloaded Extensible HTML Editor Buttons Preserved HTML Editor Markup Simple Image Sizes Apparence
Category Order Administration Articles Category Order WordPress Popular Posts Securite
Acunetix WP Security Administration WP-Security Akismet Administration Extensions Askimet WordPress Database Backup Optimisation, referencement
Google XML Sitemaps ie. Administration Reglages XML-Sitmap WP Super Cache WP Super Cache WordPress Administration Extensions WP Super Cache WP-Piwik Extensions diverses
(x)html easy validator Administration Articles Tous les articles Administration Pages Toutes les pages Advanced Code Editor
